Articles.Content:
Hey, I think if we do have large company wars, it should be dictated by how large you are. Like for every 1000 views/10 posts, you get one ship.

I mean that makes sense, right?
Hell no I wouldn't have anything.
Zekes that is a terrible Idea... I should throw you into a wood chipper.
I agree with Spartwo. It would be an out match if anyone went against you. Plus not all companies have pages
What's with you and wood chippers.Anyway that's an extremely unfair and unbalancing idea much the same as me saying "10'000 parts are allowed".
Zekes, Just because Zokesia feels the need to spam the Builders forum with several pages doesnt make you special

what's with you and wood chippers.

what you talkin bout willis?
What if I make this page my company page?.....*Maniacal laugh*

alright, no need to start the shredder, it was just a suggestion... but there is no way i should have the same amount as everyone else. Mr. Fleet Master is trying to get everyone on his side to topple me.

Odds seem fair.

-You have 3(or more)

-We have 3

And did someone say 'Shredder'?

And did someone say 'Shredder'?

wood chipper
Damn,You said shredder.
I don't get it.

I don't get it.

Its the Shredder from Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (the original not the new crappy one)

I don't get it.

Someone was born after the '80s.
I was born in 1992 but I still think the older shows were better than the newer ones

lets not talk about age i am old enough to have watched the original movies in theaters.

About Tylo is that rock unclaimed. if not id like to set up shop there if it is ill take the snowball out at the end of the universe.

Thanks Zekes, that one was fun to make i learned a lot about VTOL recently and had to put something up.
As far as I can tell, Tylo is unclaimed but its Spartwo that you need to talk to

lets not talk about age i am old enough to have watched the original movies in theaters.

About Tylo is that rock unclaimed. if not id like to set up shop there if it is ill take the snowball out at the end of the universe.

Thanks Zekes, that one was fun to make i learned a lot about VTOL recently and had to put something up.

That is correct. Tylo is unclaimed.
Tylo is Unclaimed, Bop is Mine, Laythe is Daemons, Pol is War Eagles, and Vall is Spartwo
When you attack another planet do you have to start from your planet, or do you just mod your ships in orbit round the target?
Well for the most part we just do battles for fun. Spartwo would know the rules for conquering other planets
Start from your planet, You cannot use Hyper edit to get your ships to a destination.

Start from your planet, You cannot use Hyper edit to get your ships to a destination.

In fact Hyper Edit is encouraged to keep maneuvre time down.
